sentence.Network_en: He gave her a polite husbandly smile of sexual complicity.
sentence.Network_cn: 他望着她,他的脸上流露出了丈夫的微笑,这种微笑乃是心照不宣的性生活的默契.

childly 孩子似的husbandly丈夫似的wifely妻子似的，
英语词法--形容词用法易错析 - 豆丁网 ... wifely（ 妻子般的）， husbandly（ 丈夫般的）， motherly（ 母亲般的），.

list.abs: seldom are we spending time together , and even more rarely does he want to exercise his husbandly right towards me .很少一起是我们消费时间和他很少想要行使他往我的节俭的权利。

means.word_mean: 1. of or befitting or characteristic of a husband
2. related to or suited to a husband;

sentences.sentence: "assumed husbandly duties like mowing the lawn"

auth_sentence.content: He...pressed upon her anxious lips a warm, passionate, husbandly kiss.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: He...pressed upon her anxious lips a warm, passionate, husbandly kiss.

auth_sentence.content: So as not to break Jewish laws regarding husbandly duty, he returned every Shabbat to her bed, but his wife was not pleased.
